author: cnbc.com
title: Editas Medicine to Host Conference Call Discussing First Quarter 2018 Corporate Update and Results
text:
CAMBRIDGE, Mass., April 26, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Editas Medicine, Inc. (NASDAQ:EDIT), a leading genome editing company, today announced that it will host a conference call and webcast on Thursday, May 3, 2018, at 5:00 p.m. ET to discuss a corporate update and results for the first quarter of 2018.
To access the call, please dial 844-348-3801 (domestic) or 213-358-0955 (international) and provide the passcode 6079429. A live webcast of the presentation will be available on the Investors & Media section of the Editas website.
About Editas Medicine
As a leading genome editing company, Editas Medicine is focused on translating the power and potential of the CRISPR/Cas9 and CRISPR/Cpf1 genome editing systems into a robust pipeline of treatments for people living with serious diseases around the world. Editas Medicine aims to discover, develop, manufacture, and commercialize transformative, durable, precision genomic medicines for a broad class of diseases. For the latest information and scientific presentations, please visit www.editasmedicine.com .
